labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The game's display freezes on the first few frames or a black screen. Audio still works but the game is unresponsive. The game cannot proceed past the intro cutscene. Clicking anywhere on the window flags the game as unresponsive.
data.expected_result: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth launches with the overlay activated
data.short_description: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth crashes when the overlay is turned on
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Discord is running and the overlay is enabled for The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth - Make sure your computer has both a discrete graphics card and integrated graphics, and that The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth isn't set to run on the integrated graphics - Launch The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
